1 1/2 fluid ounces sweet and sour mix (such as Mr and Mrs T'sÂ®)
des: "Wonderful, sweet rum-based beverage with Blue Curacao and Midori Melon."
ins: Fill a large glass with ice. Pour in the rum, blue curacao, melon liqueur, sweet and sour mix, and apple juice. Stir to combine.
